name: 路易斯·戴尔·瓦莱
name_full: 路易斯·戴尔·瓦莱 Luis del Valle
introduction: Luis Del Valle was born in Santo Domingo, Dominican Republic. "Ovni", "Vis a Vis" (also known as "Lucked Up"), "Aída", "La que se avecina", "Que Dios nos perdone", "No habrá paz para los malvados", and "La Familia Reyna" are some of the most important productions he has been acting. Nominated as Best Supporting Actor in a Foreign Language Film by the Madrid International Film Festival 2017, for his role Comandante Martínez in OVNI the movie. Luis Del Valle studied acting at the Nic- Instituto del Cine de Madrid, in Spain (2008). He began his acting career at DR, in college, as a member of the university theater group "Teatro Proyección" (1995). He starred several plays by the hands of Ivan Garcia and Franklin Dominguez like "Espigas Maduras", "Drogas", "Fabula de los 5 caminantes" and some others at the National Theater Company since 1997. He worked for the tv show "La Aldea Magica" during 3 years since 1999.
